name: AMAN DEEP GAUR
designation: Associate Technical Lead. Role and Responsibilities: Revamp legacy platform, build new features to automate business flow using JAVA Spring Framework. API Management & middleware Service application implementation. Leading, guiding and mentoring a strong team and instilled high work tempo to generate peak performance levels. Designing and development of software requirements and user stories using Java J2EE frameworks. Handling the ongoing production issues and deployment support on live systems and closely working with the teams for understanding and support partners and clients issues Involved in the communication with the clients or partners for product support and defect fixing. Architecture enhancement and maintenance. March' 2013 – April’ 2015, Oriflame India (P) Ltd
